name: Cookies Don't Click
description:
It's like Cookie Clicker, but you don't have to click!

Produce and watch all the cookies you're creating! (Sort of relaxing)

Use A S D F to activate the automatic cration of production lines (maximum one every type, every second)

This is a game i developed for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam

It's the first game i developed with godot and i'm pretty happy with the result.
